condition.narrative: MCTD and the Participating Water Utility Entities, will be responsible for carrying out Part 1 of the Project
MTCD shall maintain the PIU w/ TOR and resources with competent staff, all satisfactory to the Association and the PIU shall beabolished and absorbed into MCTD by 6/30/2011
MTCD shall maintain the PIU w/ TOR and resources with competent staff, all satisfactory to the Association and the PIU shall beabolished and absorbed into MCTD by 6/30/2011
the Project Implementation Unit staff shall train MCTD staff in order that MCTD staff become competent to manage and superviseimplementation of the Project

title.narrative: Average electricity consumption, measured in MWh per m3 produced

comment.narrative: Balti/1.38, Cahul/1.5, Causeni /2.87, Ungheni/1.07

Exceeded targets: Balti/0.81, Cahul/1.05, Causeni /1.35, Ungheni/1.01, Floresti/0.96No average consumption as baseline or targetindicator. The indicator is listed per town.

Cahul/1200; Causeni/5400; Floresti/539; Ungheni/763.

title.narrative: New piped household water connections that are resulting from the project intervention

comment.narrative: Measured in Cahul, Causeni, Floresti, Ungheni, Bestemac, Colibasi, Pirita, Valeni, Srata Noua, Pohrebeni,Zahorna, Sanatauca,Navirnet, Dubasarii Vechi
Cahul/100; Causeni/3; Floresti/124; Ungheni/130; Bestemac/240; Colibasi/430; Pirita/300; Valeni/330; Srata Noua/350; Pohrebeni/50;Zahorna/160; Sanatauca/870; Navirnet/800; Dubasarii Vechi/1200,

Establishment of new connections is underway and number is growing on a daily basis. Full achievement is highly likely:Cahul/117,Causeni/3, Floresti/191, Ungheni/380, Bestemac/222, Colibasi/484, Pirita/178, Valeni/349, SarataNoua/386,Recesti-35,Zahorna/52,Sanatauca/153, Navirnet/167, Dubasarii Vechi/1060

comment.narrative: Measured in Floresti and Ungheni
Floresti/560, Ungheni/59900
Connections are now being established, the number is growing on a daily bases and achievement of target is likely. Floresti/560,Ungheni/5400

comment.narrative: Share of the total water samples in town of Causeni.

title.narrative: Number of KM of Sewerage pipelines laid/rehabilitated

comment.narrative: Exceeded target.

title.narrative: Number of ME and WUE staff to be trained in fiduciary aspects of project management

comment.narrative: Major training activity is currently underway and the target is expected to be fully achieved early December 2013.

title.narrative: Number of water and sewerage utilities the Project is supporting

comment.narrative: Target achieved.

title.narrative: Number of other water service providers that the project is supporting

comment.narrative: While the project ended up improving water supply system in 10 villages, there are 9 water entities supported as Zahorna andRecesti share same service provider entity.

title.narrative: Annual electricity consumption of sewerage system in Orhei

comment.narrative: Exceeded target

title.narrative: Number of rural water systems rehabilitated

comment.narrative: System rehabilitation is nearly completed in all 10 villages and there are no risks to fully achieving the target.

title.narrative: Number of People Provided with Access to Improved Water Sources under the Project

comment.narrative: Cahul/330, Causeni/10, Floresti/410, Ungheni/500 Bestemac/800, Calibasi/1500, Valeni/1020, Pirita/1230, Sarata Noua/1350,Pohrebeni/1300, Zahorna/570, Sanatauca/3000. Navirnet/1840, Dubasari Vechi/4650
